title: 104_s996
content: The Act titled "Veterans' Insurance Reform Act of 1995" removes gender references. The Act "Veterans' Insurance Reform Act of 1995" removes gender references by changing "servicemen's" to "servicemembers'" in various sections and headings related to servicemembers. The Act "Veterans' Insurance Reform Act of 1995" updates sections and headings related to Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance, changing references from "Servicemen's" to "Servicemembers'". The Act "Veterans' Insurance Reform Act of 1995" merges Retired Reservist Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance and Veterans' Group Life Insurance, extending the latter to members of the Ready Reserves by amending specific sections. The Act "Veterans' Insurance Reform Act of 1995" merges Retired Reservist Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance and Veterans' Group Life Insurance, extending the latter to members of the Ready Reserves by amending specific sections, including the qualifications for eligibility. The Act "Veterans' Insurance Reform Act of 1995" merges Retired Reservist Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance and Veterans' Group Life Insurance, extending the latter to members of the Ready Reserves by amending specific sections, including the qualifications for eligibility. Section 1969 is amended by removing certain paragraphs and sentences. The Veterans' Insurance Reform Act of 1995 merges Retired Reservist Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance and Veterans' Group Life Insurance, extending the latter to members of the Ready Reserves by amending specific sections, including the qualifications for eligibility. Section 1969 is amended by removing certain paragraphs and sentences. Additionally, there is a provision for the conversion to commercial life insurance policy. Section 1968(b) is amended to include provisions for the conversion of insurance policies, with specific changes to clauses and sentences. Section 1977 is also amended to remove certain sentences. In section 1968(b), changes are made to insurance policies conversion provisions, including modifications to clauses and sentences. Specifically, in paragraph (a), adjustments are made regarding the payment of Veterans' Group Life Insurance if the insured individual becomes insured under Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance. In paragraph (e), the termination of Veterans' Group Life Insurance is linked to the effective date of the individual policy. SEC. 5. EFFECTIVE DATE. The Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance of any member of the Retired Reserve shall be converted to Veterans' Group Life Insurance ninety days after the date of enactment of this Act.
